launcher.title: Arcade Hub
launcher.subtitle: Game o betsu window de kidou shimasu. Purojekuto ni tsuika suru to koko ni hyouji saremasu.
launcher.coming_soon.title: Mou sukoshi
launcher.coming_soon.body: {name} no file ga mada arimasen. {path} o irete kudasai.
launcher.launch_failed.title: Start shippai
launcher.game.tictactoe.name: Tic-Tac-Toe
launcher.game.tictactoe.desc: Kura shikku na 3×3 bo-do. AI persona, theme, score kiroku tsuki.
launcher.game.blackjack.name: Blackjack
launcher.game.blackjack.desc: Dealer ni katsu made 21. Blackjack GUI o blackjack/gui.py ni oku to tsukaemasu.
launcher.game.gofish.name: Go Fish
launcher.game.gofish.desc: Rakku na kaado geemu de peaa o atsumemasu. Go Fish GUI wa gofish/gui.py ni irete kudasai.
launcher.game.yahtzee.name: Yahtzee
launcher.game.yahtzee.desc: Saikoro 5-ko o futte, saikou no category de suteaatto o umemasu.
yahtzee.options.title: Options
yahtzee.rules.title: Yahtzee Rules
yahtzee.rules.body:
Yahtzee rules:
- Up to 3 rolls per turn. You may hold dice between rolls.
- Score each category once. Upper section scores sum of matching faces.
- Three/Four of a Kind: sum of all dice (must have 3/4 same faces).
- Full House: 25 points for a 3-of-a-kind plus a pair.
- Small Straight: 30 points for a sequence of 4 (e.g., 1-2-3-4).
- Large Straight: 40 points for a sequence of 5 (1-2-3-4-5 or 2-3-4-5-6).
- Yahtzee: 50 points for five of a kind.
- Chance: sum of all dice, no restrictions.
launcher.game.minesweeper.name: Minesweeper
launcher.game.minesweeper.desc: Clear the board without hitting a mine. Safe first click and classic flagging.
minesweeper.title: Minesweeper
launcher.launch_blocked.title: Another game is running
launcher.launch_blocked.body: {holder} is already running. Close it before starting {name}.
launcher.launch_blocked.self.title: Already running
